name: The Interpretation DVD
description: A work of art that explores the relationship between nature, motion and sound, The Interpretation takes us on a languid journey through a slowly flourishing forest. Hinting at vague memories of microbiology and rotating through a cool organic spectrum of greens, blues, browns, blacks and whites; this motion-based work will entrance its viewer as the forest evolves. The Interpretation is set to a minimal score filled with authentic sounds of nature, complimenting the environmental essence of the visuals. DVD contains over 36:00 minutes of content. NTSC/Regional ALL Visuals by Michael Paul Young Soundtrack by Michael Cina and Ghostly International Published on DVD with bonus fold out poster designed by Michael Paul Young. View Videos & More

name: Find Eutaw and North
description: Finding Eutaw and North is the second dvd from the groundbreaking design firm WeWorkForThem. It includes six new videos, featuring the title video track -- a 34 minute ambient architectural interpretation of the mean streets of Baltimore, Maryland. Mixed live on custom video editing software and featuring an original soundtrack, Finding Eutaw and North pioneers mesmerizing new terrain in experimental audio-video narrative. Includes the titles: Finding Eutaw and North, Reservoir Hill, Pepto, Four One Oh, Downhill D and Them. NTSC/Regional ALL. Animation/Visuals: Michael Paul Young Soundtrack: Michael Cina View More Images

name: Enter The Dragon
description:
Every well-designed typeface has its own spirit, its own personality, its own vibration.  And every vibration has its own pulse, its own pace, its own motion.  Enter the Dragon is an experimental video compilation exploring the nuances of type. The videos don't just spell out words; each video embodies the spirit of the typeface it features. Over 40 minutes of motion graphics that are alternately blessed, enameled, processed, alloyed, selected, exposed, composited, and otherwise thrown-down in a no-holds-barred battle reminiscent of Andy Kaufman's wrestling career.

Artists who contributed: MK12, Matt Owens of Volumeone, Joshua Davis, Nando Costa, Gmunk, Michael Paul Young, Greyscale, Shilo, Jens Karlsson of Chapter3, GHava, Typevsm, U-C-E-R*, C505, Justin Harder, Joost Korngold of Renascent, Danny Yount, Chandler Owen, Suk Koch, Feel Good Anyway, Lance Sells of Normal Natural, Quinta-feira, Laundry, Eddie Pak of Suction, Burkom, Rocketpowered Mice, and Yann Orhan.

Originally published by YouWorkForThem.
NTSC/Regional ALL

name: Shilo: We Make it Good
description:
In true Shilo fashion, this book/DVD is not merely a compilation of the studio’s past projects, but rather a thoughtful collection that brings a whole new dimension to the work by showcasing conceptual pieces that both inspired, and were inspired by, the projects themselves. The studio sheds light on these new conceptual pieces presenting them in full motion as an array of never-before-seen experimental pieces. The disc also offers a rare glimpse into the thought process of the team in a number of behind the scenes featurettes focused on Shilo’s work for Angels & Airwaves, Audio Bullys, and Converse. 

Originally published by YouWorkForThem
NTSC/Regional All
